title: Virtual Community of Practice (VCoP)-Based Medical Professional Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology proficiency and patient care experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, combining asynchronous modules with monthly case discussion sessions

learning_goals: Learners collaborate with peers on the VCoP platform to perform and discuss analyses of five or more clinical cases
Learners explain and apply three patient-centered treatment protocols through asynchronous modules
Learners improve their clinical approaches two or more times based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
